example.title: Averaging Algorithm
example.para: Let's consider a very simple algorithm for computing the average of numbers x1 through xn:

step.para: add each number xi together (for every i between 1 and n)
the result is the average value

example.para: Note that the first step involves quite a bit of work! This is what we would call a relatively high-level instruction, in that it makes a rather heavy assumption about the reader's problem solving knowledge (specifically, that they understand they need to add x1 to x2, add that sum to x3, etc...).
